title: Carrental Website
description: Responsive car rental site built with Next.js and CSS, showcasing UI design and client-side routing.

title: Coupon Website
description: Dynamic coupon-sharing platform using Next.js, Node.js, and React, with real-time deal updates and backend integration.

title: User Registration and Authentication System
description: Full-stack authentication system with NextAuth.js, Express, and MongoDB, supporting secure login.
